line.version: I got this job as player character for the Doglion's FlashPunk Tutorials!
This is the third version, and it's really long so that I can test out the scrolling functionality of the JRPG Engine on which The Doglion's FlashPunk Tutorials are based upon.
That stupid old woman won't talk to me. Absolutely silent.
...and grandpa found a dinosaur egg, but then grandma said "It's not a dinosaur egg, it's still warm. Somebody left it there and you better put it back..."
